path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - World Beyond Smartcontracts - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: Omission of Hashing for Relevant Parameters
findings.description: The omission of hashing for all relevant parameters could potentially pose security risks in the future, allowing players to exploit this vulnerability and gain unauthorized control over NFT items within the game.

findings.title: There are no NFT ID in signed message
findings.description: The functions mentioned above utilize signature verification but lack NFT ID in signed messages, potentially posing security risks.
findings.function: sync_loyalty_points(), issue_loyalty_ticket(), apply_loyalty_ticket(), craft(), claim(), open(), mint(), upgrade(), upgrade_and_burn()
